name: WP PlusOne This
author: Dennis Hernandez

sections.description:
This is a simple plugin without any hassles, it automatically adds the Google Plus One Button to your WordPress posts and pages.
There is no admin for this plugin since everything is done automatically, just upload the plugin , activate it and it will add the necessary code for the Google +1 Button to appear on every post and page.
The Button will be located at the Top-Right Corner Inline with your posts.

Features:

  • Automatically included on Posts
  • Automatically included on Pages
  • Button location is at the Top-Right Corner Inline With the Text
  • Simple enough, Does not slow down your site, Does not mess up other plugins
sections.installation:
Install

  1. Unzip the wp-plusone-this.zip file.
  2. Upload the the wp-plusone-this folder to your wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.

Activate

  1. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  2. Activate the WP PlusOne This plugin

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please CONTACT US
sections.faq:
How can I contribute?

  • Check out or Blog and Subscribe to our Newsletter
  • Follow Us on Twitter at @headlessgeek
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Plugin released

0.2

  • Fixed : PlusOne +1 button shows the same count on every post of the front page of some blogs when refreshing. Added href=”‘.get_permalink().'” to update every count in every post or page

short_description: The WP PlusOne This plugin, automatically adds the Google Plus One ( +1 ) Button to your WordPress posts and pages.
